mapper.select:
select u.USER_ID as userId, u.NAME, u.PHONE_NO as phoneNo, u.USER_NAME as userName, u.EMAIL, DATE_FORMAT(u.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTime, r.DESCRIPTION as roleName, u.state from sys_user u left join sys_user_role ur on u.USER_ID=ur.USER_ID left join sys_role r on ur.ROLE_ID=r.ROLE_ID where 1=1
and u.CREATE_TIME >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and u.CREATE_TIME <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and u.USER_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{userName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
